title: Chapter 4500 - Chapter 4500: 449918 Origin Stones!
body:
Chapter 4500 - Chapter 4500: 449918 Origin Stones!

Chapter 4500: 449918 origin stones!

“What?”

“How is this possible? How Can Wu Tongming be so powerful?”

“He has a heavenly fate treasure on him. This? Could it be that his grandfather gave him a heavenly fate treasure?”

“No, that’s impossible. Even Wu Tongming’s father doesn’t have a heavenly fate treasure. Why would he give him a heavenly fate treasure?”

In the surrounding area, a group of experts who knew Wu Tongming from the 10 suns federation revealed an incredulous expression when they saw his terrifying strength.

How long had Wu Tongming broken through?

It had only been a few million years!

How could he have such powerful strength now?

He was even stronger than an ordinary control-level expert!

This made them feel incredulous.

In addition, where did he get his heavenly fate treasure?

It was impossible for such a treasure to be on a beginner-level heavenly fate powerhouse!

It wasn’t just the ten days alliance’s powerhouses who were shocked.

Wu Tongying couldn’t figure it out either.

If it wasn’t for his brother’s arrogant words, he would have thought that this wasn’t his brother!

“Little Ming he? ?”

At the same time, Wu Tongming’s parents were fighting with their opponents on the control level battlefield.

However, they were also paying attention to their children.

When they saw their son’s strength that was even stronger than theirs, they were also extremely shocked!

“That Heavenly Yuan Destiny Supreme Treasure is from the forbidden area of life. How could this kid obtain the treasure there?”

Soon, Wu Tongming’s father sensed the arrival of the ultimate treasure of Tianyuan in his body. He growled in disbelief!

Whoosh! Whoosh

However, while they were still in shock, Wang Xian had already rushed to the front of the control-level powerhouse.

He flew directly to the side of the corpse. With a thought, Wang Xian kept the two origin stones.

He was so powerful that none of the experts around him could sense it!

“Senior, go help my parents!”

Wu Tongming, who was in Wang Xian’s body, immediately said when he saw that he had succeeded!

“Alright!”

Wang Xian nodded and didn’t refuse!

He flew directly to Wu Tongming’s parents.

“Dad, Mom, let me help you!”

Wu Tongming shouted and said!

“Xiao Ming, how did your strength improve so quickly?”

Wu Tongming’s mother couldn’t help but ask.

“It’s a long story. I’ll tell you all after the battle!”

Wu Tongming replied!

“Alright!”

Wu Tongming’s parents still believed in their son. They thought that he had obtained a powerful opportunity.

Boom

Wang Xian controlled the ultimate treasure of Heaven’s origin and attacked the powerhouses of the Behemoth Alliance.

The powerful might of the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin and the strange energy caused his expression to change drastically!

The battle continued, and the fight continued!

Wang Xian controlled Wu Tongming’s body and merely maintained the fight.

He did not reveal his strength!

As time passed, more powerhouses were killed in the surroundings.

Furthermore, there were two powerhouses who had just entered the Heaven’s origin realm.

“One of them has a stone of origin on him!”

Wang Xian sensed it and his mind moved!

At this moment, a powerful energy flew over from the front.

Wang Xian waved his arm and pretended to be unable to block it in time. He was hit by the energy directly.

Boom

The powerful energy caused him to be injured instantly and he flew backward.

Under Wang Xian’s control, the place where he flew to was the corpse with the Stone of origin!

“Xiao Ming!”

“Son!”

Wu Tongming’s parents’faces changed drastically when they saw this scene.

They didn’t have any doubts about Wu Tongming being sent flying.

That was because from their point of view, although their son was very strong now, his combat experience wasn’t enough!

“Dad, Mom, I’m Fine!”

Wu Tongming shouted at his parents hurriedly to prevent them from worrying.

Buzz

When Wang Xian was close to a certain distance, he easily took the origin stone away again!

Following that, he controlled Wu Tongming’s body and dashed forward again!

Taking advantage of the situation, Wang Xian was able to display his abilities to the fullest.

In a short period of time, he had four origin stones in his hands. Including the ones in his hands, he had a total of five!

“I just need to get more than ten more!”

Wang Xian’s eyes sparkled.

Following that, the battle continued.

More and more experts around him died.

In fact, there were even experts of the Great Dao level who died in front of him.

There were also a large number of experts who rushed towards the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens in an attempt to control it!

For the time being, Wang Xian did not focus his attention on the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens. Instead, he continued to fish in troubled waters.

There were experts who had died. As long as they had the stone of origin, Wang Xian would immediately approach them and take it away.

This was because after Wang Xian took it away, he would use the power of chaos to simulate a stone of origin and inject it into his body. There were no experts around him and he realized that there was something wrong.

After all, the five existences at the level of chaos were all in the midst of a battle. There was no time for them to come over!

This caused the number of origin stones in Wang Xian’s hands to increase!

“I have 15. I’ll get a few more just in case!”

After a few minutes, the number of origin stones in Wang Xian’s hands had reached 15. His eyes were filled with excitement.

He decided to get a few more and then snatch the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens!

Boom

He didn’t know if Wang Xian was lucky or something else!

At this moment, the body of an expert of the Great Dao level suddenly flew toward them.

This expert was on the verge of death. There were flames burning on his body.

His life force was disappearing at a terrifying speed.

He died before he reached Wang Xian!

“Red Ancestor.”

Wu Tongming recognized this figure when he saw him and shouted!

Wang Xian sensed the origin stone in the body of this powerhouse and flew over.

Buzz! Buzz

He waved his arm and kept the three origin stones.

“Son, keep the body of red ancestor!”

Not far away, Wu Tongming’s father immediately shouted at him!

This dead Great Dao level powerhouse was an expert from their supernatural universe.

Keeping the corpse would reduce the losses after resurrection!

“Alright!”

Wu Tongming immediately agreed. Wang Xian waved his arm and kept the corpse.

“Send a voice transmission to your parents. Tell them that you are going to use the powerful powers of the Heaven’s origin destiny treasure to go to the Nine Heavens Divine Roc!”

Wang Xian kept the three origin stones. The origin stones in his hands were enough for him to completely fuse the primal chaos stones with himself!

He stared at the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens and instructed Wu Tongming!

“Yes, Senior!”

Wu Tongming nodded immediately and transmitted his voice to his parents!

“Son, are you confident? Be careful!”

Although Wu Tongming’s parents hesitated, they still agreed.

Their son was stronger than them now. Furthermore, he had the ultimate treasure of the Heaven’s origin.

Maybe this heavenly creation treasure has a special skill.
